## Fix Dates

# never created str dates... how come?

```{r fixdates}

strDates = as.character(climate_data$DATE) 
climate_data$NewDate[2:12418] = format(as.Date(strDates[2:12418], "%m/%d/%y"), "19%y-%m-%d") 
climate_data$NewDate[12419:19950] = format(as.Date(strDates[12419:19950], "%m/%d/%y"),"20%y-%m-%d")

climate_data$Month = format(as.Date(climate_data$NewDate), format = "%m")
climate_data$Year = format(climate_data$NewDate, format="%Y")

MonthlyTMAXMean = aggregate(TMAX ~ Month + Year, climate_data, mean)
str(MonthlyTMAXMean)
MonthlyTMAXMean$Year=as.numeric(MonthlyTMAXMean$Year)

TMAX.lm = lm(TMAX ~ NewDate, data= climate_data)
```
